videos.title: 2025 Life Time Big Sugar Gravel presented by Kenetik Race Highlights
videos.description:
Catch the broadcast cutdown from the season finale of the 2025 Life Time Grand Prix — Life Time Big Sugar Gravel presented by Kenetik.

Pulled straight from the live coverage presented by Orange Seal, this highlight reel captures every decisive moment from Bentonville’s big showdown. The men’s race completely reshaped the overall standings, while the women’s field traded attacks to the line.

🎥 Watch now

Official podium jersey brought to you by Pas Normal Studios.

Learn more about the Life Time Grand Prix: lifetimegrandprix.com
Learn more about Life Time Big Sugar Gravel presented by Kenetik: bigsugarclassic.com

videos.title: Big Sugar Gravel: 36mph Crash to 6th Place
videos.description:
Tune in for the final round of the LifeTime Grand Prix series in Bentonville, Arkansas. With massive thunderstorms, the race was shortened to 50 miles which made for an absolutely chaotic day. I had one of the hardest crashes of my life along with Hayden, but battled back to contest the field sprint taking 6th place! Hayden battled back as well to finish 5th in the U23 category and secure 3rd overall. He needed five stitches but no broken bones thankfully.

Onboard footage is from @jgoettl2.0’s GoPro, go check out his great channel! Livestream media credit to LTGP.

Thanks for following along crew, this is probably one of the biggest results of my career and I’m proud to take you along for the ride!
